00104 #define TREX_REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(assembly, class_name, label, propagator)\
00105   {  \
00106     EUROPA::ConstraintEngine* ce = (EUROPA::ConstraintEngine*) assembly.getComponent("ConstraintEngine"); \
00107     using EUROPA::ConcreteConstraintType; \
00108     using EUROPA::LabelStr; \
00109     REGISTER_CONSTRAINT(ce->getCESchema(), class_name, #label, #propagator);\
00110   }
00111 
00120 # define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00121   REGISTER_FLAW_FILTER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00122 
00131 # define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00132   REGISTER_FLAW_HANDLER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00133 
00142 # define TREX_REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00143   REGISTER_FLAW_MANAGER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00144 
00153 # define TREX_REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(assembly, class_name, label) \
00154   REGISTER_COMPONENT_FACTORY(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::ComponentFactoryMgr*)assembly.getComponent("ComponentFactoryMgr")), class_name, label);
00155 
00164 # define TREX_REGISTER_MATCH_FINDER(assembly, class_name, label) \
00165   REGISTER_MATCH_FINDER(((EUROPA::SOLVERS::MatchFinderMgr*)assembly.getComponent("MatchFinderMgr")), class_name, label)
